languages.text: {n}Воздух заметно холодеет. Несколько секунд ничего не происходит, а затем друкари вдруг начинает сникать, пока не опускается на колени. Остекленевшие глаза чуть прикрываются, на бледном лбу появляется мучительная складка, словно ксенос пробуждается от дурного сна.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Воздух заметно холодеет. Несколько секунд ничего не происходит, а затем друкари вдруг начинает сникать, пока не опускается на колени. Остекленевшие глаза чуть прикрываются, на бледном лбу появляется мучительная складка, словно ксенос пробуждается от дурного сна.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Воздух заметно холодеет. Несколько секунд ничего не происходит, а затем друкари вдруг начинает сникать, пока не опускается на колени. Остекленевшие глаза чуть прикрываются, на бледном лбу появляется мучительная складка, словно ксенос пробуждается от дурного сна.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks down on his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, like the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks down on his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, like the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}La température baisse brutalement. Le temps reste suspendu quelques instants, puis Marazhai tombe lentement à genoux. Ses yeux déments se ferment légèrement et un pli inquiet vient lui barrer le front, comme si le xénos sortait d'un cauchemar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La température baisse brutalement. Le temps reste suspendu quelques instants, puis Marazhai tombe lentement à genoux. Ses yeux déments se ferment légèrement et un pli inquiet vient lui barrer le front, comme si le xénos sortait d'un cauchemar.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}気温が一気に下がる。しばらくの間は何も起こらなかったものの、マラズハイがゆっくりと膝をついた。あたかも異種族が悪夢から目覚めようとしているかのように、うつろな目がわずかに閉じ、眉間に苦悶のしわが寄る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}気温が一気に下がる。しばらくの間は何も起こらなかったものの、マラズハイがゆっくりと膝をついた。あたかも異種族が悪夢から目覚めようとしているかのように、うつろな目がわずかに閉じ、眉間に苦悶のしわが寄る。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}周围的温度剧烈下降。乍看之下似乎没有发生什么事情，但玛拉斋却慢慢跪了下来。他微微闭上了呆滞的眼睛，额头上浮现出了一道痛苦的皱纹，仿佛刚刚从噩梦中惊醒一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}周围的温度剧烈下降。乍看之下似乎没有发生什么事情，但玛拉斋却慢慢跪了下来。他微微闭上了呆滞的眼睛，额头上浮现出了一道痛苦的皱纹，仿佛刚刚从噩梦中惊醒一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Die Temperatur fällt deutlich ab. Einige Augenblicke lang geschieht nichts, doch dann geht Marazhai langsam auf die Knie. Seine hypnotisierten Augen schließen sich leicht, und auf seiner Stirn erscheint eine gepeinigte Falte, als würde der Xenos aus einem Albtraum erwachen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Temperatur fällt deutlich ab. Einige Augenblicke lang geschieht nichts, doch dann geht Marazhai langsam auf die Knie. Seine hypnotisierten Augen schließen sich leicht, und auf seiner Stirn erscheint eine gepeinigte Falte, als würde der Xenos aus einem Albtraum erwachen.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}La temperatura desciende considerablemente. Durante un instante no sucede nada, pero entonces Marazhai se postra lentamente de rodillas. Con la mirada desencajada, el xenos entorna los ojos y su frente se arruga por la angustia, como si estuviese despertando de una pesadilla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La temperatura desciende considerablemente. Durante un instante no sucede nada, pero entonces Marazhai se postra lentamente de rodillas. Con la mirada desencajada, el xenos entorna los ojos y su frente se arruga por la angustia, como si estuviese despertando de una pesadilla.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Sıcaklık ciddi ölçüde düşüyor. Bir süre hiçbir şey oluyor, Marazhai yavaşça dizlerinin üstüne çöküyor. Donakalmış gözleri hafifçe kapanıyor ve kaşlarında acılı bir kırışıklık peyda oluyor. Zeno, sanki bir kâbustan uyanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The temperature drops considerably. Nothing happens for a few moments, but then Marazhai slowly sinks to his knees. His transfixed eyes close slightly, and an anguished crease appears on his brow, as if the xenos is waking from a nightmare.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sıcaklık ciddi ölçüde düşüyor. Bir süre hiçbir şey olmuyor ancak ardından Marazhai yavaşça dizlerinin üstüne çöküyor. Donakalmış gözleri hafifçe kapanıyor ve kaşlarında acılı bir kırışıklık peyda oluyor. Zeno, bir kâbustan uyanıyor gibi.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
